entry.title: replace-by-fee v0.10.0rc4
entry.summary: In this message, Allen Piscitello argues that Bitcoin needs to address the issues it faces instead of ignoring them out of benevolence. He compares it to addressing a fire hazard by providing fire extinguishers and smoke detectors rather than matches, which would make one an arsonist. The message ends with a signature for authenticity and a link to learn about email encryption in support of online privacy.
